1.0.name: wordpress/events-handler
1.0.description:
The plugin features a straightforward user interface in the WordPress dashboard to add/edit and delete events and set some options. Events Handler allows you to list Events on a seperate page or in the sidebar, or both. Here you can list Old (archived) events future events and if you want, events happening today. When you create or edit an event you can set it to be archived. So that it remains listed. Optionally non-archived events are automatically deleted one day (24 hours) after they expire. Many more options are available like sell online tickets and Events Handler is completely customizable to your theme in an easy and flexible manner.

Features

  • Widget for themes that support it
  • Separate page for events
  • Completely customizable layout
  • Multi language
  • Link events to pages/posts
  • Set a start and end time (duration) for events
  • Modern Admin Panel
  • Show events in your sidebar
